data.oai_dc:dc: Data was collected from nine Damaraland mole rats in laboratory conditions, using Labchart software. Animals were exposed to 5 hrs of 0% CO2, 21% O2, balance N2. Abbreviations in data files: % O2 - % outflowing O2, % CO2 - % outflowing CO2, BL - pressure deflections adjusted for baseline drift throughout trial, Neg Int - Integration of all pressure values below zero, -BL - BL data * -1
